items.text: sticks with the full-pitched length, and Lakmal caresses this drive to long off for a single
items.postText: Mashur: "I am sure a lot of native BD fans has just taken coffee like me to remain awake till midnight. But seems like the Lankans has decided to send us early to bed."
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lakmal, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, and angling into his body. Fended off the front foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, no run

items.text: full, but slow outside off. He swings wildly across the line, but misses the shot completely
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and Lakmal tries to pull across the line. But the shot turns out straighter than he would've wanted. Trickles away to mid on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, no run

items.text: yorker on leg stump, but slower this time. Comfortably dug back to the bowler
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, no run

items.text: straight as an arrow! Overpitched on middle, and he clears his front leg to thump a confident shot right over Rubel's head
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, FOUR runs

items.text: good length outside off, and punched to cover. No run
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, no run

items.text: overpitched on off stump, and Dilruwan muscles a drive past the outstretched hands of Shakib for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: slower through the air, and lands on a length outside off. Dilruwan makes room to cut, but he's deceived by the (lack of) pace
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Lakmal, no run

items.text: good length just outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Lakmal, no run

items.text: full outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover. Just a single though
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Lakmal, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, and he defends with the straight bat to short cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: arm ball outside off stump, and he steers this late past the keeper to short third man
items.postText: Sandeep: "@hirapradhan: It's not the ICC but ACC that makes decisions regd. Asia Cup. I would have liked more teams to be added to the main competition as well."
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: good length on off, and that's been worked off his pads to midwicket
items.postText: Looks like Lakmal is suffering from a cramp. The physio is out as well.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, no run

items.text: good length on off, and he flat-bats a pull to wide midwicket for a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, and that's been blocked off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: goes short again, and this time the pull has been mistimed behind square for a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off, and that's been pulled to deep midwicket once again off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length outside off, and he slaps a cut past the cover-point fielder to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Lakmal, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off, and thumped past the cover-fielder for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and spinning into his body. Punched off the back foot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, and worked off his pads to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off stump, and this has been drilled down the ground too
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Lakmal, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, and he nudges this to deep point off the back foot. They walk across for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and defended off the front foot. Back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Lakmal, no run
